p2.l2: are the driver of memorable experiences

intro: From information architecture, to researching UI elements, to maniacally curating interactions.
Plus, my first love, program optimization.
portfolio: I have collaborated with companies such as: Nexi, Sky, Fastweb, IBL, Generali, Corner, AMDL Circle.
Here are some of my most relevant projects.

intro: I was born in <ImageVenice>Venice</ImageVenice> in september '86, today I live in Como and work at <ImageSketchin>Sketchin</ImageSketchin>, an advanced-design studio, as Creative Technologist.
The third version, in 2004, was the first to have the top-level domain <ImageTCMGTK>theycallmegiulio.tk</ImageTCMGTK>
Since then I have been designing and implementing virtual experiences. I have studied different programming languages and databases to cover the whole stack.
clan: It is the name of a clan of players of which I was the co-founder. A community whose main interest was a passion for <ImageBW>Starcraft: Brood War</ImageBW>.
At that time (it was the early 2000s) I began to combine fun for this game and passion for my work, practicing building the first <ImageNO2>Numbers One</ImageNO2> website.

A year later I built a <ImageNO3>web 2.0 portal</ImageNO3> with features such as logins, news, interviews, uploads and sharing of game replays. Visual design with Photoshop, frontend with HTML, CSS and Javascript. Custom backend with PHP Codeigniter and MySql. It still looks like a modern stack.
Today, as then, I enrich my work with constant training, updating, sharing and curiosity.
method:
Creating a successful product is not just about having beautiful aesthetics and impressive animations.
The effectiveness and usability of a project depends on the synergies formed between designer and developer.

I promote continuous, attitudinal
and methodical improvement
for myself and others
If international recognition comes on top of that, it is a greater satisfaction.
